heroTitle: Effortless Time Tracking for Your Business
heroDescription: TimeWise Tracker helps you and your team manage work hours seamlessly. From live tracking to detailed exports, we have you covered.

features.headerTitle: Everything you need, nothing you don't.
features.headerDescription: TimeWise Tracker is packed with features designed to make your time tracking as effortless and accurate as possible.

timeTracking.title: Live Time Tracking
timeTracking.desc: Start and stop a timer with one click. Your work duration is recorded accurately without any manual calculations.

specialEntries.title: Manual & Special Entries
specialEntries.desc: Easily add or edit entries for past work, or log sick leave, PTO, and holidays with dedicated entry types.

location.title: Location & Travel
location.desc: Automatically fetch your current location or manually input it. Track travel time and driver status for accurate compensation.

export.title: Seamless Export
export.desc: Generate professional-looking timesheets in Excel and PDF formats, ready to be sent for payroll or records.

smart.title: Smart Suggestions
smart.desc: The app learns your habits and suggests locations and times based on your previous entries to speed up your workflow.

pauseCalculation.title: Automatic Pause Calculation
pauseCalculation.desc: Based on your work duration, the app suggests the legally required pause time, which you can apply with one click.

pricing.landingDescription: One plan that includes everything you need. No tiers, no add-ons, no surprises.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can sign up and use TimeWise Tracker with all its features for free for 14 days. No credit card is required to start your trial.

faqs.question: Can I track time for multiple projects or clients?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The 'Location' field can be used to specify different projects, clients, or tasks. Our upcoming features will include dedicated project and client management for even better organization.

faqs.question: How does the Excel and PDF export work?
faqs.answer: From the "Preview & Export" page, you can select any month and download a professionally formatted timesheet. The Excel file is ready for calculations, and the PDF is perfect for printing and signing.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, your data is securely stored using Firebase, a platform by Google. We use industry-standard security practices to ensure your information is safe.
